summary: Two noble Scottish brothers deliberately take opposite sides when Bonnie Prince Charlie returns to claim the throne of Scotland in order to preserve the family fortune.
cast: Errol Flynn|Roger Livesey|Anthony Steel|Beatrice Campbell|Yvonne Furneaux|Felix Aylmer|Mervyn Johns|Charles Goldner|Ralph Truman|Francis De Wolff|Jacques Berthier|Robert Beatty|Charles Carson|Archie Duncan|Mabel Etherington|Moultrie Kelsall|Sam Kydd|Jack Lambert|Gillian Lynne|Rex Montgomery|Arthur Mullard|Jack Taylor|Stephen Vercoe
